visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: 'Monthly Data Trends', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#003366) for the axis labels and titles, with a font size of 14px. The x-axis should have categories for each month from January to December. The y-axis should be logarithmic with minor tick intervals set to 'auto'. Data series: The series should include one set of data with the values [0.29, 71.5, 1.06, 1292, 14.4, 1.760, 135, 1.48, 0.216, 0.194, 9.56, 54.4]. Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#003366) for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color (#F5F5F5), add a legend with the title 'Data Series', and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Data Trends'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is a light gray (#F5F5F5). The chart has a margin of 50 pixels on all sides. The x-axis displays categories for each month from January to December, with labels styled in dark blue (#003366) and a font size of 14px. The y-axis is logarithmic with minor tick intervals set to 'auto', and its labels and title are also styled in dark blue with a font size of 14px. The data series includes one set of values corresponding to each month, with a gradient color from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#003366). The legend is titled 'Data Series' and is styled similarly to the axis labels and titles. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart that effectively displays the monthly data trends.
